articles.title: S. Korea and US Joint War Maneuvers Assailed
articles.content:
S. Korea and US Joint War Maneuvers Assailed
 Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet war hawks blustered that they would stage joint naval exercises with the U.S. within July as part of the "countermeasure" against the case of sunk warship and conduct more than ten war maneuvers including the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises and an anti-submarine drill in the East Sea, the West Sea and the South Sea of Korea in a sustainable manner. 
					 The south Korean puppet group had a confab with the U.S. over the issue of the joint naval maneuvers at the 26th meeting of the south Korea-U.S. "security policy initiative" held in Washington on July 9. It said that the group would make public a specific action plan at the "diplomatic and defense chiefs talks" with the U.S. due to be held in Seoul on July 21.
					
					 The U.S. military war-like forces declared they would massively hurl forces of the U.S. 7th Fleet including nuclear-powered carrier "George Washington" into the waters off south Korea to stage joint naval maneuvers larger than the preceding joint military exercises. 
					
					 A spokesman for the National Peace Committee of Korea in a statement Friday vehemently denounced the projected large-scale joint maneuvers as extremely dangerous and reckless ones designed to harass the peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia and escalate the tension there and serious military provocations to the DPRK on behalf of all the Koreans and other peace-loving people of the world.
					
					 The warship case which the south Korean puppet group and the U.S. are using as a pretext for staging the above-said joint naval maneuvers faced a stern judgment of the domestic and foreign public as its conspiratorial nature was brought to light, the statement noted, and went on:
					
					 The south Korean puppet group referred the warship case, an anti-DPRK conspiratorial farce, to the UN only to suffer bitter disgrace, much less getting any recognition of the "results of investigation" announced by it.
					
					 The above-said moves of the south Korean puppet group and the U.S. are intolerable as they are extremely reckless provocations to recover from the diplomatic defeat in the UN and persistently pursue the anti-DPRK conspiratorial racket and moves to tighten "sanctions" against it.
					
					 The prevailing situation proves with added clarity that it is none other than the U.S. and the south Korean puppet group that are harassing the peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia and the recent conspiratorial case was an extremely dangerous plot to ignite a war of aggression against the DPRK.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will never remain an onlooker to the projected provocative war maneuvers of the enemies. Should the group of traitors finally stage the above-said maneuvers together with the U.S., the army and people of the DPRK will consider them as a grave infringement upon its dignity and sovereignty and strongly react to them.

articles.title: Choe Yong Rim Congratulates Slovak PM
articles.content:
Choe Yong Rim Congratulates Slovak PM
 Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- Choe Yong Rim, premier of the Cabinet of the DPRK, Thursday sent a congratulatory message to Iveta Radicova upon her appointment as prime minister of the Slovak Republic.
					 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would positively grow stronger, the message wished the prime minister success in her responsible work. 
					
					 Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun sent a similar message to Mikulas Dzurinda upon his appointment as foreign minister of the Slovak Republic on the same day.

articles.title: S. Korean Rev. Han Sang Ryol Visits Kaesong Area
articles.content:
S. Korean Rev. Han Sang Ryol Visits Kaesong Area
 Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- Rev. Han Sang Ryol of south Korea visited the Kaesong area between July 13 and 15.
					 He looked round the monument to President Kim Il Sung's signature in Panmunjom. The President left his august name in a historical document for putting an end to the tragedy of national division and achieving the reunification of the country during the last moments of his life.  
					
					 Han also went round the room where armistice talks were held, the hall where the Armistice Agreement was signed and other places and saw the concrete wall built in the area south of the Military Demarcation Line. 
					
					 He inspected King Wang Kon's Mausoleum and Pakyon Falls in the Kaesong area and visited different places including the Koryo Museum, Sonjuk Bridge and Sungyang School there. 
					
					 He also toured the area of the Recreation Ground on Mt. Jongbang.

articles.title: Anniversary of DPRK-Russia Joint Declaration Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of DPRK-Russia Joint Declaration Marked
 Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- Alexander Matsegora, charge d'affaires a.i. of the Russian embassy here, arranged a reception at the embassy Friday to mark the 10th anniversary of the publication of the DPRK-Russia Joint Declaration. 
					 Present there on invitation were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Ri Yong Chol, vice department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and officials concerned. 
					
					 Staff members of the Russian embassy were on hand. 
					
					Alexander Matsegora said at the reception that the Korean people are working hard to greet the 65th anniversary of the foundation of the Workers' Party of Korea with high political zeal and brilliant labor achievements and fling open the gate to a thriving nation in 2012 under the leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He sincerely wished the Korean people greater success in all their work and expressed the belief that they would attain their goals without fail.
					
					Yang Hyong Sop said in his speech that the publication of the DPRK-Russia Joint Declaration at the historic meeting between  Kim Jong Il and President Putin in Pyongyang was a momentous event which provided fresh foundation in boosting the traditional relations between the two countries.
					
					 Noting that visits, contacts and exchange between the two countries have been activated in various fields and progress made in the work for vitalizing the bilateral cooperation after the publication of the joint declaration, he expressed the hope that exchange and cooperation between the two countries would further develop in the future, too. 
					
					 Earlier to the reception, a friendly gathering took place at the Russian embassy on the same occasion.

articles.title: Agro-scientific Researches Make Headway
articles.content:
Agro-scientific Researches Make Headway
 Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- The Academy of Agricultural Science of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea has pushed ahead with researches for boosting the agricultural production. 
					 It has paid a great attention to forecasting the growth of crops in a scientific and rapid way and improved the efficacy and productivity of biological agrochemicals and microbial fertilizers, including high-concentration phosphorous bacterial fertilizer. 
					
					 It has also chosen ultramodern technical goods badly needed for agricultural output and developed technologies for their production.
					
					 Meanwhile, it has intensified researches into information technology, nanotechnology, bioengineering and other basic technologies to put the agricultural science on a higher level.
					
					 It is now concentrating its effort on making database of fields and plots. 
					
					 It has made a big progress in applying nanotechnology to making sterilizer, growth stimulant, photosynthetic accelerant, etc. and breeding and introducing high-yielding species of crops, including potato species strong in epidemic resistance.

articles.title: Summer Tea Leaves Picking Begins
articles.content:
Summer Tea Leaves Picking Begins
 Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- Summer tea leaves picking began in the Kangryong Unjong Tea Plantation of the DPRK.
					 The tea leaves picking is at its height in the plantation.
					
					 As all the tea plants were manured and cultivated on a scientific and technological basis, they are now lush with green healthy leaves.
					
					 The workers there are harvesting tea leaves every day much more than their daily plan while drying them in good time by operating the drying facilities in full capacity.

articles.title: S. Korean Police's Crackdown on Reunification Forces Blasted
articles.content:
S. Korean Police's Crackdown on Reunification Forces Blasted
 Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- The Youth and Students Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration in south Korea on July 12 released a statement denouncing the fascist suppression of forces for the pro-reunification movement by the puppet police.
					 The statement accused the "Intelligence Service" and the "Security Investigation Group" of the Seoul District Police Agency of searching the house of Kim Yong Ho, chairman of the "Pro-Reunification Youth", on July 8.
					
					 It denounced the authorities for committing such fascist repression for the mere reason that Kim supported Yun Ki Jin, ex-chairman of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance of Youth and Students for Korea's Reunification, now behind bars.
					
					 Lee Myung Bak who lost popularity due to his dictatorial rule and the policy for confrontation with the DPRK was thrown into a tight corner because of the recent "Cheonan" warship case, the project for "improving four large rivers", the "Yongpho Society's" power abuses, etc., the statement noted, slashing Lee for making desperate efforts to maintain his dictatorial power through suppression and a tyrannical rule.
					
					 Noting that the people desirous of independence, democracy and reunification will not yield to any suppression, the statement urged the Lee regime to stop at once the indiscriminate crackdown on the pro-reunification movement forces, properly understanding the public mind-set.

articles.title: Foreigners Visit DPRK Embassies
articles.content:
Foreigners Visit DPRK Embassies
 Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- Personages of different countries and an international organization visited the DPRK embassies on July 3 and 8 on the occasion of the 16th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They were the secretary general of the Vietnam-DPRK Friendship Association, the general secretary of the C.C., the Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist), a secretary of the Indian National Congress Party, the director of the Indian Institute for Foreign Policy Studies, the chairman of the Juche Idea Study Society of Indian Delhi, the chairman of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Bangladesh, the chairman of the Central Executive Committee of the Bangladesh National Socialist Party, the general secretary of the C.C., the Socialist Party of Bangladesh, the secretary general of the Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee, representatives of the Communist Party in Sweden, the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association and the Swedish Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, the directors of the M. K. P. Company, the Zawala Company and the Johnson Nicholson Company of Malaysia and the director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea.
					
					 They laid floral baskets and bouquets before the portraits of the President to pay tribute to him.
					
					 Meanwhile, the Cuban Institute of Friendship with the Peoples and the chairman of the Development Bank of the Mediterranean and chairman of the Italian General Investment Group sent floral baskets to the DPRK embassies on July 8.

articles.title: Anniversary of Demise of Kim Il Sung Commemorated
articles.content:
Anniversary of Demise of Kim Il Sung Commemorated
 Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- The Hannover Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in Germany released the bulletin "Great Man of Century" carrying a picture of President Kim Il Sung on July 8, the 16th anniversary of his demise.
					 The bulletin said in an article that Kim Il Sung is the distinguished leader recognized by the whole world and a great man who showed the road ahead of mankind by founding the guiding idea for the era of independence.
					
					 Praising him as the peerlessly elder statesman who made immortal contribution to the human cause of independence through his uncommon leadership, it stressed that he always lives with humankind as the sun exists forever.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Italy
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Italy
 Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- The Italian Committee for the Study of Songun Idea for Independence and Sovereignty brought out in pamphlet President Kim Il Sung's work "Let Us Uphold Independence" on the occasion of the 16th anniversary of his demise.
					 The work, published on September 7, Juche 70 (1981), clarifies the idea that to uphold independence in party and state activities is the most correct policy suited to the requirements of the present era and the tasks and ways for maintaining independence.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats Praised
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats Praised
 Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- Seminars, lectures, Korean book and photo exhibitions, film shows and handicraft exhibitions took place in Russia, Myanmar, Malaysia, Nigeria, Bangladesh, Ethiopia and Guinea between June 28 and July 9 to commemorate the 16th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					On display in their venues were works of Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il and photos on their immortal exploits, pictures introducing the Korean people in the efforts to build a great prosperous and powerful nation and handiworks associated with the Koreans' wisdom and talents.
					
					 Speeches were made at the events.
					
					 The president of the Bangladesh People's League and other speakers stressed that as prominent thinker-theoretician and great statesman Kim Il Sung performed undying feats for the human cause of independence and provided bright future to the progressive mankind by founding the Juche idea, the Songun idea and building Korean-style socialism based on it.
					
					The chiefs of Juche idea study organizations in Ethiopia said that the revolutionary history of
						 Kim Il Sung serves as the textbook of life and struggle for the world revolutionary people championing independence at present and his life for the country and the people is deeply kept in the hearts of the world revolutionary people.
					
					The chairman of the Guinean Society for the Study of the Juche Literary Idea said in a lecture: 
						Kim Il Sung is always alive in the hearts of the Korean people for his noble popular personality as well as the enormous exploits he performed for the people all his life. He will always live in the hearts of the world's progressive mankind.
					
					 Appreciated at the film shows were Korean films on his personality as a great man.

articles.title: Story of Kim Jong Suk
articles.content:
Story of Kim Jong Suk
 Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- On September 23, Juche 22 (1933), 
					anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk received an order to participate in a battle to attack Badaogou from a command of the Anti-Japanese Guerrilla Army.
					
					  A propaganda team of the Young Communist League of Korea led by her stealthily took combat positions together with companies of the guerrilla army and a Chinese anti-Japanese nationalist unit.
					
					 When the battle started, they all dashed into the town.
					
					 But their attack was halted soon by severe firing from the enemy’s battery.
					
					 With the battery left intact, it would be difficult to avoid casualties and, furthermore, expect a victory in the battle. 
					
					 At that moment she suggested to the propaganda team an idea of containing the enemy with agitation shouts.
					
					 She then shouted "You Self-Defense Corps men, for whom do you take rifles and fight? Lay down your rifles. We will not accuse you of your past doings. Help the guerrillas!"
					
					 All the members of the propaganda team joined her in shouts.
					
					 Overcome by the shouts, the enemies stopped firing.
					
					 That day, the agitation shouts played a decisive role in winning the battle.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige roturadas marismas Taegyedo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige roturadas marismas Taegyedo
Pyongyang, 16 de julio (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno las marismas Taegyedo roturadas con exito.
					 Tras escuchar las explicaciones ante el plano de las marismas, recorrio durante largo tiempo los diques atravesando el mar y las marismas, que se pierden en el horizonte, enterandose detalladamente del estado de roturacion.
					
					 Evaluo altamente los meritos de los constructores y voluntarios, quienes construyeron excelentemente otra gran creacion de la epoca del Partido del Trabajo superando con valentia el salvajismo de la naturaleza y usando su heroismo masivo y abnegacion ilimitada, y les expreso el mas profundo agradecimiento especial.
					
					 Los constructores terminaron esta enorme obra de transformacion de la naturaleza comparable con la obra del Complejo Hidraulico del Mar Oeste, dijo y senalo que este prodigio asombroso deviene el precioso resultado de la voluntad indomable del pueblo coreano, decidido a levantar a toda costa en la tierra patria una gran potencia prospera con las fuerzas y tecnicas propias, y la demostracion fehaciente del infinito poderio espiritual del heroico pueblo coreano unido monoliticamente en  torno al partido.
					
					  El Dirigente dispenso a los constructores un gran honor al proponer personalmente el otorgamiento de la Orden Kim Il Sung y el Premio Kim Il Sung al Complejo de la Roturacion de Marismas de la Provincia de Phyong-an del Norte, que al terminar esta obra, materializo brillantemente el legado del Presidente Kim Il Sung, y al diseno de roturacion de marismas Taegyedo, respectivamente.
					
					  Averiguo la situacion de cultivo agricola recorriendo los arrozales acondicionados en las marismas roturadas.
					
					  Informado de que se eleva cada ano el rendimiento de los arrozales, se puso muy contento e instruyo los remedios para impulsar bien la agricultura en los polderes.
					
					  La roturacion de las marismas es una de las labores importantes para la prosperidad del pais, subrayo y presento las tareas programaticas para impulsar esta obra en mayor medida en el futuro.
					
					  Prosiguio que los obreros del citado complejo deben terminar en un corto tiempo la segunda fase de la roturacion de las marismas de Kwaksan y la construccion de la red de las inconclusas facilidades internas de los polderes empleando aquel espiritu e impetu mostrados en los dias de roturacion de las marismas Taegyedo.
					
					 El complejo debe esforzarse incesantemente por buscar mucho mas nuevos terrenos cultivables sin relajar ni en lo minimo el impetu con que completaron la roturacion de las marismas, agrego e hizo el gran favor de solucionar el problema de vehiculos necesarios a la roturacion.
					
					  Dado que la roturacion futura de las marismas resulta un dificil y enorme proyecto de geotransformacion, es preciso prestarle la atencion estatal, menciono y subrayo la necesidad de tomar estrictas medidas para proveer de todo lo necesario a la obra.
					
					 Por ultimo, el Dirigente se retrato con los innovadores laborales del complejo.
					
					 En esta ocasion, el Dirigente fue acompanado por Kim Phyong Hae, secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Phyong-an del Norte, Jang Song Thaek, vicepresidente del CDN de la RPDC y jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Kim Kyong Hui y Thae Jong Su, jefes de departamento, y Ri Jae Il, primer subjefe de departamento, del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige la Empresa Pesquera Amnokgang
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige la Empresa Pesquera Amnokgang
Pyongyang, 16 de julio (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno el taller de acuicultura y el ostrero, construidos nuevamente en la Empresa Pesquera Amnokgang. 
					Ante todo, el Dirigente visito el taller de acuicultura.
					
					Se entero en detalles del estado de construccion y de conservacion de pescados recorriendo varios lugares del taller. 
					
					Al ver los peces carnosos como cofres y lenguados que abundan en los estanques alineados, se mostro muy satisfecho de que los empleados de la empresa hayan construido de manera rentable este moderno taller de gran capacidad y criaran muchos peces sabrosos y nutritivos, y evaluo de altos sus meritos.
					
					El Dirigente presento las tareas que se presentan en la administracion del taller.
					
					Para aumentar y normalizar la produccion de peces en este taller magnifico dotado de modernas instalaciones, es necesario aplicar ampliamente los avanzados y cientificos metodos de cria y, al mismo tiempo, elevar mas el nivel de conocimientos cientifico-tecnicos de los empleados, enseno. 
					
					Todas las unidades en zonas litorales deben aumentar de distintas maneras la produccion de peces para suministrar en todas las estaciones del ano los pescados frescos a los habitantes, puntualizo.
					
					Acto seguido, el Dirigente estuvo en el ostrero. 
					
					La ostra es un alimento sabroso, nutritivo y muy saludable y por eso, nuestro pueblo viene consumiendola mucho desde la antiguedad, dijo el Dirigente y apunto la necesidad de seguir intensificando la cria de ostras que resultara cada vez muy productiva usando cebos naturales. 
					
					Hay que realizar decisivamente la cientifizacion y la modernizacion de la cria de ostras, asevero e indico el rumbo y los remedios concretos para el respecto. 
					
					Le acompanaron el secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Phyong-an del Norte, Kim Phyong Hae, el vicepresidente del CDN de la RPDC y jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Jang Song Thaek, los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Kim Kyong Hui y Thae Jong Su, y el primer subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Ri Jae Il.

articles.title: Han Sang Ryol recorre la zona de Kaesong
articles.content:
Han Sang Ryol recorre la zona de Kaesong
Pyongyang, 16 de julio (ATCC) -- El pastor surcoreano Han Sang Ryol visito del 13 al 15 del mes en curso la zona de Kaesong.
					En Phanmunjom el vio la lapida con la firma que el Presidente Kim Il Sung puso por ultima vez en su vida al pie del documento historico para eliminar la tragedia de division nacional y lograr la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					Ademas, estuvo en varios lugares, tales como la sala de negociaciones de armisticio, la sala de firma del Acuerdo de Armisticio y la muralla de hormigon armado construida en la zona surena de la linea de demarcacion militar.
					
					Tambien recorrio el Mausoleo del rey Wanggon y la cascada Pakyon, que se encuentran en la zona de Kaesong, y otros establecimientos como el Museo de Coryo, el puente Sonjuk y el colegio privado Sungyang.
					
					Por otra parte, realizo una excursion  a la zona de diversiones del monte Jongbang.

articles.title: Se dinamiza en Corea investigacion cientifica sobre la agricultura
articles.content:
Se dinamiza en Corea investigacion cientifica sobre la agricultura
Pyongyang, 16 de julio (ATCC) -- La Academia de Ciencias Agricolas de Corea libra intensamente la investigacion para garantizar el exito de la produccion agricola con las tecnologias super-sofisticadas.
					 Los investigadores de la academia prestan mucha atencion al pronostico cientifico y rapido del crecimiento de los cultivos.
					
					 Ellos logran adelanto en las labores para mejorar la eficiencia y la productividad de los fertilizantes microbianos, incluyendo el abono bacteriologico fosforico de alta densidad, y de los productos agroquimicos vegetales y para clasificar y aplicar conforme a las condiciones reales las tecnologias sofisticadas y las productivas, etc., que contribuyen a la produccion agricola.
					
					  Por otra parte, se esfuerzan ingentemente por llevar al nivel de punta las ciencias agricolas en su conjunto basandose en los proyectos de estudios basicos y metodologicos, incluyendo la IT, la nanotecnologia y la biotecnologia.
					
					  En particular, estan enfrascados en averiguar con mas detalles las caracteristicas de cada parcela y en crear la base de datos sobre el particular.
					
					  Lograron un gran avance en los trabajos para ampliar e introducir integralmente en las practicas agrarias los exitos de la nanotecnologia, incluyendo el desinfectante, el estimulante de crecimiento y el otro de fotosintesis hechos con ella, y para cultivar las plantas agricolas de buenas variedades,  incluyendo la patata muy resistente a la epidemia, aplicando los exitos biotecnologicos.
